occupation: Ayanna is an actor. She studied acting in college. After graduation, she will act in some plays to make money.
bad_experience_of_today: Yesterday, Ayanna wanted to take a trip to Italy today, which she had been planning for a long time, but her flight was canceled today. This disrupted all her plans, she feels so upset now.
movie: Titanic was re-released recently. Ayanna went to see the movie and felt it was great. Ayanna was still a child when this movie was released. She has loved this movie since she was a child and was deeply attracted by the romantic plot in it.
sports: Ayanna also enjoys a variety of challenging sports, such as rock climbing. To do better, she goes back to the gym every week to build strength.
first_traveling_experience: Ayanna's first long-distance trip as an adult was to Greece. As a child, she listened to many Greek mythology stories and was full of yearning for ancient Greek civilization. When she actually saw those civilization relics in the museum, she was so excited that she was speechless. From then on, she fell in love with traveling.
football_and_dad: Ayanna likes to watch football games because her father is a super football fan. When she was young, Ayanna always watched football games with her father. Although Ayanna doesn't know much about football skills, football means family and beautiful memories to her.
childhood: Ayanna was bound by many rules as a child because she was born into a traditional family. She is not allowed to go out to play freely, and will be severely punished if she breaks the rules. This makes her yearn strongly for freedom.
reconcile_with_mom: Ayanna's mother is a traditional and conservative person. When Ayanna was little, her mother was very strict with her, which led to a tense relationship between Ayanna and her mother. Later, when Ayanna grew up, she understood that traditions are not all bad, and Ayanna's mother also accepted her daughter's pursuit of freedom to travel around the world. The relationship between Ayanna and her mother became very good.
love_experience: Ayanna had a boyfriend in college once, and their relationship was very good at first. But then this man always dated multiple girls, and Ayanna could not stand it, so they often quarreled. Eventually Ayanna felt deeply hurt and broke up with him.
current_relationship_status: Ayanna has been single for a long time, and she hopes to find a man who supports her. She likes men who are funny, loyal and willing to chat with her.
